DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate different effects of Eurythmy Therapy on psychological and physiological parameters of circulation and thermoregulation
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Effects of Eurythmy Therapy on Psychophysiological Parameters
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults 1855 Years old, signed informed consent available Any known diseases of the cardiovascular system, allergic reactions to electrode patches in the past, coffee, alcohol or smoking less than 3 hours prior to the study, insufficient knowledge of the German language
